attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
ILLEGAL HUMAN TARGETING

1. STOP POLICE INTELLIGENCE FROM USING
   SKULL BASE ANTRUM IMPLANTS IN NHS
   HOSPITALS.
2. STOP POLICE INTELLIGENCE FROM
   INTERROGATING TARGETS ON NETWORK
   VOICE TO SKULL SIGNAL.
3. PROTECT CIVILIAN VICTIMS OF THESE
   ILLEGAL TARGETING SCHEMES.
4. STOP IMPLANT TARGETING OF TEACHERS.
5. ALLOW PRESS REPORTING OF POLICE
   IMPLANT TARGETING WITHOUT APPLYING
   CLASSIFICATION OR CENSORSHIP.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
